forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 44F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High around 45F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain early. Low near 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the evening. Low 42F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 47F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Some snow showers mixing in in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning rain followed by a mix of rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow showers with snow becoming steadier and heavier late at night. Low 1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with some snow showers in the evening. A steady snow likely after midnight. Low 33F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will transition to snow showers during the afternoon. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will transition to snow showers during the afternoon. High 38F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 24F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 23F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. High -1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. High 31F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 40%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. High near 0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. High 33F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -1C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low near 30F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High near 35F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low near 0C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 33F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning will become rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 0C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 33F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
